description:
In this episode, see high school boys make plans for summer, go to the beach, play table tennis, pretend to host a radio talk show, create great summer memories, and become obsessed with a girl.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Danshi Koukousei to Natsu Keikaku / Danshi Koukousei to Umi no Ya / Danshi Koukousei to Onsen Takkyuu / Danshi Koukousei to Radio DJ / Danshi Koukousei to Natsu no Omoide / Danshi Koukousei to Tsuugaku Densha / Joshikousei wa Ijou "Kareshi to Seifuku"

High School Boys and Summer Plans / High School Boys and Beach Houses / High School Boys and Hot Springs Table Tennis / High School Boys and Radio DJs / High School Boys and Summer Memories / High School Boys and the Train to School / High School Girls Are Funky: Boyfriends and Uniforms
男子高校生と夏計画 / 男子高校生と海の家 / 男子高校生と温泉卓球 / 男子高校生とラジオDJ / 男子高校生と夏の思い出 / 男子高校生と通学電車 / 女子校生は異常「彼氏と制服」
